Package src

Class Street

java.lang.Object
src.Street
public class Street extends Object
Street class is a class that keeps the data of many buildings and performs some special operations for these buildings. It also has a menu that interacts with the user.
Since:
06-03-2022

    • addLeftSide

      public void addLeftSide(Buildings Building)
      In order to add the new building to the left of the street, it first makes some checks (ex. ground control, capacity control...). After these checks, it adds the building to the left of the street in the correct order according to the location.
      Parameters:
      Building - Any building type desired to be added to the left of the street

    • addRightSide

      public void addRightSide(Buildings Building)
      In order to add the new building to the right of the street, it first makes some checks (ex. ground control, capacity control...). After these checks, it adds the building to the left of the street in the correct order according to the location.
      Parameters:
      Building - Any building type desired to be added to the right of the street

    • removeLeftSide

      public void removeLeftSide(int removePosition) throws Exception
      First of all, it checks the building on the left of the street whose location is given. Then it removes the appropriate building from the array and creates a deleted copy.
      Parameters:
      removePosition - The location of the building to be removed from the left side of the street
      Throws:
      Exception

    • removeRightSide

      public void removeRightSide(int removePosition) throws Exception
      First of all, it checks the building on the right of the street whose location is given. Then it removes the appropriate building from the array and creates a deleted copy.
      Parameters:
      removePosition - The location of the building to be removed from the right side of the street
      Throws:
      Exception

    • remainingLength

      public int remainingLength()
      Calculates the length of all buildings on the street and subtracts it from the length of the street to find the remaining space.
      Returns:
      Area where the remaining building will be placed

    • buildingList

      public String buildingList()
      It calculates how many building types are on the street and adds all the information of those buildings after this information.
      Returns:
      Number of different building types and their details

    • playgroundNumberRatio

      public String playgroundNumberRatio()
      Display the number and ratio of lenth of playgrounds in the street
      Returns:

      public void callingFocusing(int wantedPosition)
      It calls the function that focuses on a specific information of the building and print this information and all the details of the building.
      Parameters:
      wantedPosition - Location of the building whose specific information is expected
